game.name: MaSzyna
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: MaSzyna is a simulator which will allow you to become a train driver of most popular railway vehicles used on the Polish railways.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MaSzyna is a simulator which will allow you to become a train driver of most popular railway vehicles used on the Polish railways.
